title: karuNai koNDennai
sahitya:
karuNai koNDennai kaDait-tETriDu murugA aruNagirinAtharai nI AtkoNDadu pOl


anupallavi

  sharavaNabhavam ennum tiru mantiram tannai karudik-karaindu un kazhalaDi tozhuvEn


caraNam    aDiyAraik-kai viDAdu aravaNaittavar paDum iDarEdum toDarAdu tuDaittiDat-tavarAdu
vaDa pazhani tannil kuDi koNDu tigazhum vaDivazhagA undanai vandanai purivEn
